description:
Are you tired of playing old similar boring simulation games and looking for something exciting and unique? Try Army Truck Driver 3D… this is an awesome android game that has completely transformed the theme of simulation games.
Now you can be an army truck driver and work for saving your territory from enemies. Army Truck Driver 3D has unique war theme palyers need to deliver army convoy from one base camp to other through difficult hurdles.
The fixed time duration, battle environment and hidden ground mines makes game more exciting and creates an urge to play more. This offroad 3D simulation game has 12 levels with different hurdle level and engaging graphics.
If you are keen for driving simulation games and need something different and unique in simulation than download Army Truck Driver 3D is perfect for you.
Features of Army Truck Driver 3D
• Amazing war theme with 3D graphics
• Well crafted multiple 3D army truck
• Incredible battle sounds and audionic army war tunes
• Engaging complexities like gound mines and ambus in every level
• Different camera angles
• Offroad driving simulation

How to Play Army truck driver 3D:
• Select your desired truck from selection menu
• Deliver your army convoy from one base camp to the other
• Being a truck driver you have to cross different hidden hurdles like ground mines or you may get ambus at any time
• 3D Truck driving in Army Truck driver 3D is quite unique as compared to other simulation games
• Use simulation buttons to move forwards and left and right button for moving left and right
• Manage avoid dropping convoy or crashing truck by this game will be over
• Manage to get through all levels
